name: Bevy Jam #2
description:
Source: Code can be found on: https://github.com/mahulst/bevy_jam_2
The goal of the game is to make the very realistic wheat field on the right side on the screen be the opposite of the wheat field on the left side. Basically harvest all the squares that are colored yellow on the left side.

How to play?
Schedule the commands for the combine harvestor bij pressing the arrow keys.
Press enter to execute the plan you made beforehand. The game well tell if your plan matched the goal.
